alert.note: Alert for Central Penobscot; Central Piscataquis; Central Washington; Interior Hancock; Northern Somerset; Northern Washington; Southern Penobscot; Southern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 21 at 3:48PM EST until December 22 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 7 PM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 5 inches, sleet accumulations of around one half of an inch and ice accumulations of around one quarter of an inch expected. * WHERE...Portions of Central Highlands, Far Eastern, Interior DownEast, North Woods and Penobscot Valley Maine. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 7 PM EST Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Expect slippery roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.
